title: ðŸš¨ Los Angeles Chargers hire Brandon Staley - Emergency Podcast (Football 1/18)
description:
Will Brinson and John Breech offer their immediate reactions to the somewhat surprising hire of Brandon Staley by the Chargers. First, the guys share some details about Staley's history, as he doesn't have the same pedigree as some of the other coaches out on the market. Based on that, Breech is a bit concerned that this might be a stretch by LA. The Chargers have Justin Herbert and likely will have playoff expectations next season, so Staley enters an attractive situation, but one that's also filled with pressure.Â

Will Brinson and John Breech offer their immediate reactions to the somewhat surprising hire of Brandon Staley by the Chargers. First, the guys share some details about Staley's history, as he doesn't have the same pedigree as some of the other coaches out on the market. Based on that, Breech is a bit concerned that this might be a stretch by LA. The Chargers have Justin Herbert and likely will have playoff expectations next season, so Staley enters an attractive situation, but one that's also filled with pressure.Â
